thread.title: Adele Drops a Grammys F-bomb, Restarts Her George Michael Tribute
thread.title_full: Adele Drops a Grammys F-bomb, Restarts Her George Michael Tribute

author: spearmankahron@gmail.com (Kahron Spearman)
title: Adele Drops a Grammys F-bomb, Restarts Her George Michael Tribute
text:
Screengrab via KeganOfficial/Youtube BTW 
Sunday's Grammys provided George Michael the rousing tribute he deserved, featuring Adele knocking out a rendition of his “Fast Love.” But not before incredulously requesting to start over—and dropping an F-bomb on air. Adele restarting her tribute performance to George Michael on live TV #Grammys pic.twitter.com/QgMvOhBCDQ — Tatiana King Jones (@TatianaKing) February 13, 2017 
"Can we please start it again? I'm sorry, I can't mess this up for him," said the exasperated singer, before confidently launching into a strong second effort. 
This is the second year in a row that Adele suffered from performance issues. In last year’s show, a piano malfunction dampened her rendition of “All I Ask.” 
Following her restart, Twitter blew up, amazed at her gumption and applauding her efforts to do Michael’s hit song justice. adele is too real for the grammys whoa — Shea Serrano (@SheaSerrano)   perfection is human. we love them even more. #Adele keepin it 100 — Bobby Bones (@mrBobbyBones) February 13, 2017 . @Adele stopped mid-song during her George Michael tribute https://t.co/MEC1Ns1tMu
